titles.title: A resolution establishing procedures for separate consideration in the House of extraneous provisions passed by the Senate.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 4/29/1987--Introduced. Amends rule XXVIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to establish a procedure for separate consideration of any measure passed by the Senate, or any Senate amendment to any measure or amendment passed by the House, which is presented to the House prior to action on a request for a conference.
